newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Treasury offers A$800 mln of notes.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Treasury offers A$800 mln of notes.

text.p: The Australian Treasury will offer a total of A$800 million of Treasury notes for tender on Wednesday, the Reserve Bank of Australia said.
The tender comprises A$300 million of five-week notes, A$200 million of 13-week notes and A$300 million of 26-week notes.
The RBA said it would take up an additional A$100 million of the 13-week notes for its own portfolio.
The Treasury last week offered a total of A$1.2 billion of notes, comprising A$200 million of five-week notes, A$600 million of 13-week notes and A$400 million of 26-week notes.
There are A$795 million of non-official holdings of T-notes maturing in the week ending January 16.
